name: Endless Faller (beProsto)
description:
- a game about falling endlessly

For now the game will be linux-only, but i'm working on a possibility for a windows port.

Game made for Geta Game Jam.

It's crappy, problematic and fun to play only if you're masochistic. But i had a lot of fun making it, and i learned a lot along the way. c:
